response.overview: The story of Chhattisgarhi film Lafantoosh is of Orphan 4. Whom the priest of the temple has been brought up, the priest is very gentle and honest, and all these four ruffians do the work of dishonest theft and bullying, all these things do not suit the priest. He drives all the four Lafantoush away from the temple, people eat from door to door, where they meet different people, as well as heroine, after that they improve and start living a life of honesty. To steal repeatedly requires your partner to steal over and over again.
response.title: Lafantoos
